docs.text: This documentation is for Magento 1.x. For Magento 2.x, see here . Table of Contents Home License Release Notes Sitemap Versions What is Tokenize User Authentication? Tokenize User Authentication is a Magento extension for providing tokenized, passwordless authentication for administrators and customers. Benefits of Tokenize User Authentication One-time, token-based user sessions Easy and secure authentication method Eliminates brute force attack vectors
